mapper.select: select a.store_id, a.high_store_id, a.passwd, a.business_nm, (select business_nm high_business_nm from tb_store where store_id = a.high_store_id) high_business_nm, a.ceo, a.ceo_birth, a.corp_regist_num, a.corp_regist_num2, a.corp_type, a.business_cond, a.industry_type, a.tel, a.fax, a.phone_num, a.email, a.contract_date, a.bank_code, b.bank_nm, a.account_num, a.state, a.hompage, a.zip_code, a.address, a.detail_address, a.terminal_id, a.imei, a.person_nm1, a.person_phone1, a.person_email1, a.person_nm2, a.person_phone2, a.person_email2, a.person_nm3, a.person_phone3, a.person_email3, a.commission, a.period, a.tax, a.cpid, a.settlement_type, a.created_id, a.created_datetime, a.updated_id, a.updated_datetime from tb_store a left join tb_bank b on a.bank_code = b.bank_code where a.store_id = #{store_id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_store ( store_id, high_store_id, passwd, business_nm, ceo, ceo_birth, corp_regist_num, corp_regist_num2, corp_type, business_cond, industry_type, tel, fax, phone_num, email, contract_date, bank_code, account_num, state, hompage, zip_code, address, detail_address, terminal_id, imei, person_nm1, person_phone1, person_email1, person_nm2, person_phone2, person_email2, person_nm3, person_phone3, person_email3, tax, commission, period, cpid, created_id, created_datetime ) values ( #{store_id}, #{high_store_id}, #{passwd}, #{business_nm}, #{ceo}, #{ceo_birth}, #{corp_regist_num}, #{corp_regist_num2}, #{corp_type}, #{business_cond}, #{industry_type}, #{tel}, #{fax}, #{phone_num}, #{email}, #{contract_date}, #{bank_code}, #{account_num}, #{state}, #{hompage}, #{zip_code}, #{address}, #{detail_address}, #{terminal_id}, #{imei}, #{person_nm1}, #{person_phone1}, #{person_email1}, #{person_nm2}, #{person_phone2}, #{person_email2}, #{person_nm3}, #{person_phone3}, #{person_email3}, #{tax}, #{commission}, #{period}, #{cpid}, #{created_id}, now() )
mapper.update:
update tb_store set
high_store_id = #{high_store_id},
business_nm = #{business_nm},
ceo = #{ceo}, ceo_birth = #{ceo_birth},
corp_regist_num = #{corp_regist_num},
corp_regist_num2 = #{corp_regist_num2},
corp_type = #{corp_type},
business_cond = #{business_cond}, industry_type = #{industry_type}, tel = #{tel}, fax = #{fax}, phone_num = #{phone_num}, email = #{email},
contract_date = #{contract_date},
bank_code = #{bank_code},
account_num = #{account_num},
state = #{state},
state_datetime = null,
state_datetime = now(),
hompage = #{hompage}, zip_code = #{zip_code}, address = #{address}, detail_address = #{detail_address},
terminal_id = #{terminal_id},
imei = #{imei},
person_nm1 = #{person_nm1}, person_phone1 = #{person_phone1}, person_email1 = #{person_email1}, person_nm2 = #{person_nm2}, person_phone2 = #{person_phone2}, person_email2 = #{person_email2}, person_nm3 = #{person_nm3}, person_phone3 = #{person_phone3}, person_email3 = #{person_email3},
tax = #{tax},
commission = #{commission},
period = #{period},
cpid = #{cpid},
passwd = #{passwd},
updated_id = #{updated_id}, updated_datetime = now() where store_id = #{store_id}
